snippet.title: Galactic Adventures for the Apple II
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

Atari 8-bit


Game description:

Galactic Adventures is a RPG where you can choose between different races, and optimize your basic and advanced skills as you wish.

After you are happy with your choice, you can travel between different planets or go on an adventure, where you fight enemies. 

The fights are, typical for SSI games, turn-based.


What I think:

The game is not bad, yet the fights are REALLY hard...well, maybe it was because I had bad equipment.
